title: Want to save the planet? Stop trying to be its friend

title_detail.value: Want to save the planet? Stop trying to be its friend

summary: Research reveals how advertisers, politicians and economic systems play on the psychology of 'climate compensation' -- and encourages a more rational approach to environmental responsibility.

summary_detail.value: Research reveals how advertisers, politicians and economic systems play on the psychology of 'climate compensation' -- and encourages a more rational approach to environmental responsibility.
